name: Turtle & bottle
description:
You're a turtle trying to escape endless flow of pollution.

Swim in the sea and avoid any contact with trash while a friendly boat cleans up the area for extra points (btw … you can operate the ship in the multiplayer...).

Control the TURTLE with ARROW KEYS.

Avoid swimming into pollution.

Eat green salad to restore some health.

Control the BOAT with WASD (multiplayer only).

Collect pollution by sailing near it and pressing SPACE.

Collect 250$ by cleaning pollution or eating salad to WIN.

#TeamSeas
